project.name: Lamadmin
project.description: The Foo API: a library for doing X, Y, and Z

formCtrl.name: formCtrl
formCtrl.description: Controler of the forms of the instances

mainPannelCtrl.name: mainPannelCtrl
mainPannelCtrl.description: Controler of the main pannel of the page (central space).

tabsControler.name: tabsControler
tabsControler.description: Controler of the tabs in the main pannel when displaying a multi tabs module/user/page

unicTabCtrl.name: unicTabCtrl
unicTabCtrl.description: Controler of the tabs in the main pannel when displaying a single tab interface (like the home page or a user)

sideBarCtrl.name: sideBarCtrl
sideBarCtrl.description: Controler of the side barre of the application.

userListCtrl.name: userListCtrl
userListCtrl.description:
Controler of the list of the services in the sidebar

This controler is going to get the list of the installed module when instanciated

classitems.description:

classitems.author: Ariel Flesler

classitems.description: Event called to fetch the form of an instance
classitems.name: getFormEvent

classitems.description: Methode caled to empty the current form
classitems.name: clearForm

classitems.description: Methode caled to submit the current form to the server (and so save it to the Rexify file)
classitems.name: submit

classitems.description: Methode caled to delete the form (and also in the Rexify file)
classitems.name: delete

classitems.description: Methode caled in array arguments to add a new slot in the array
classitems.name: addNewElement

params.name: array
params.description: The array on which we clicked

classitems.description: Methode caled to remove one element from an array in a form
classitems.name: deleteItem

params.name: arrayIndex
params.description: The number of the array we clicked on

params.name: itemIndex
params.description: The number of the argument in the array we want to delete

classitems.description: Methode caled to test if the form is empty or not
classitems.name: formNotEmpty

return.description: True if empty, false if not.

classitems.description: Methode displaying the home page (with the instruction on how tu use lamamos)
classitems.name: loadHome

classitems.description: Methode displaying the configuration of a user
classitems.name: loadUser

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the user we want to see the configuration

classitems.description: Methode displaying the configuration of a module
classitems.name: loadModul

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the module we want to see the configuration

classitems.description: Methode removing all the tabs
classitems.name: clearTabs

classitems.description: Methode adding a tab to the ones displayed
classitems.name: addTab

params.name: title
params.description: The name of the tab to add

params.name: content
params.description: The content of the tab (as html code)

classitems.description: Event called to update the current tab content
classitems.name: updateCurrentTab

classitems.description: Methode displaying the configuration of a module
classitems.name: changeTab

params.name: tab
params.description: The tab to display (JSON containing {name, content})

classitems.description:
Methode caled when we click on a "add new" button in a submodule configuration. This methode
is going to get the form for a new instance of the current submodule
classitems.name: add

classitems.description:
Methode caled when we click on an instance of a submodule configuration. This methode
is going to get the form of the instance selected
classitems.name: click

params.name: instance
params.description: The instance on which we clicked (we only use the name parameter of this object)

classitems.description: Methode caled when we click on the logo or at the loading of the page to load the home page
classitems.name: loadHome

classitems.description: Methode caled to load the form of a module that don't needs any tabs (like a user)
classitems.name: loadInstance

params.name: activePage
params.description: The current par of the interface we are in (config/home)

params.name: activeModule
params.description: The current module we are in

params.name: activeSubModule
params.description: The current submodule we are in

params.name: activeInstance
params.description: The current instance we are in

classitems.description:
Methode returning the class of a line of the side bare. If it needs to be overlayed
becose it is selected of not.
classitems.name: getClass

params.name: type
params.description: The type of the line (User or Service)

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the line (name of the Service or the User)

return.description: Class to add to the line of the side bar.

classitems.description: Methode loading the home page (called when click on the logo in top left corner)
classitems.name: displayHome

classitems.description: Methode who gets a blank form to create anew user
classitems.name: addUser

classitems.description: Methode called when clicking on a flag to change the language of the application
classitems.name: changeLanguage

classitems.description: Methode called in order to retrieve the list of the users from the server and display them in the DOM
classitems.name: update

classitems.description: Methode called when we click on a user in the list

params.name: user
params.description: The name of the user on which we clicked

classitems.name: click

classitems.description: Event called to update the list of the user (retrieve it from the server)
classitems.name: updateUsersList

classitems.description:
Methode called when we click on a slider next to a Service

This methode is going to activate or desable the service (switch it's status).

params.name: module
params.description: The name of the service of which we clicked the boolean activation slider

classitems.name: clickBoolean

classitems.description:
Methode called when we click on a Service

This methode is going to load the configuration of that service

params.name: module
params.description: The name of the service of which we clicked the boolean activation slider

classitems.name: click

classitems.description:
Guzzle node.js test server to return queued responses to HTTP requests and
expose a RESTful API for enqueueing responses and retrieving the requests
that have been received.

- Delete all requests that have been received:
     DELETE /guzzle-server/requests
     Host: 127.0.0.1:8124

 - Enqueue responses
     PUT /guzzle-server/responses
     Host: 127.0.0.1:8124

     [{ "statusCode": 200, "reasonPhrase": "OK", "headers": {}, "body": "" }]

 - Get the received requests
     GET /guzzle-server/requests
     Host: 127.0.0.1:8124

 - Shutdown the server
     DELETE /guzzle-server
     Host: 127.0.0.1:8124
classitems.license: See the LICENSE file that was distributed with this source code.
